markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Supernatural Charm](/Feats.aspx?ID=81) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Half-Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=85" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 58 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring. You can cast 1st-level [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) as an arcane innate spell once per day.
name: Supernatural Charm
